name: Minima18: Quasar
description:
"Quasar? Why is this game called such" the Baron asked.

"Tis a newly discovered object in the heavens which occurs wh--"

"I KNOW WHAT A QUASAR IS", he roared, "BUT WHY IS THIS CALLED ... THAT"

He continued. "THIS DOES NOT DEPICT SUCH A PHENOMENA".

The Princess was lost for words. "I wish I could defend such an action... but I cannot" She stared at the floor. "Maybe he did no research before naming his creation? Maybe he just thought it sounded cool? Maybe he just likes the word"

The Baron smirked. " Do you think he now realises it should have been called Pulsar?"

The Princess put her head in her hands and quietly sighed, "Yes, yes he does".

Minima?

Minima is my series of games that focus on a single game mechanic. Due to time constraints the presentation of these games is fairly ... minimal.

This is my 18th Minima game ("bitesize nuggets of gaming fun!") and my April entry for #1GAM.

If you enjoyed this then why not go to my website for more gaming snacks made for my own amusement. Thanks.
